You didn’t think you could only use one Gizmoid at a time, did ya? What kind of cruel world would that be, huh?
Among all the useless junk you’ll be picking up, some of the stuff has value to it.
These scrap parts can be repurposed to make new Gizmoids later, so you’ll wanna get them all.
And that’s what Crabity’s for! So go ahead and drag him to your ship!
Point Crabity at the small scrap to collect.
Some of these asteroids have to be shot twice as much to take them out.
